ComicInfo.Characters: Wings,Full Force [Honcho,Wheels,Hardedge [Bruce Chaisson],Scandal],Arson [Nick Pugh],Wanda,Jimmy,Battery] (cameo),Assault,Vort-X [Tajana Juarez],Muffin,Regulators [Blackjak [Spence Hillman]
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:57:00 [Issue ID 4000-238526] urn:comicvine:4000-238526 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 07:16:04. [Issue ID 766284]
ComicInfo.Summary: Arson takes the spotlight as we delve into the psyche of what it must be like for someone who has to live with a "Midas Touch" of fire! How does he eat? How can he exist without touching other people? Without being close? And what deviltry does Scandal have in mind to win him over to her side? Kurt Busiek, Ron Randall, Dan Davis and Dale Gruber (with the ever lovely, ever smiling Richard Starking!) bring everything to a "Burning Point".
ComicInfo.Title: Burning Point
